turns.text: tell me the FullName of the maker amc

turns.query: SELECT Fullname FROM car_makers WHERE maker = "amc"

turns.text: Tell me CountryName for Countryid  1, 2, and 3.

turns.query: SELECT countryname FROM countries WHERE countryid=1 or countryid=2 or countryid=3)

turns.text: Tell me the model id made by amc...

turns.query: SELECT modelid FROM model_list WHERE model = "amc"

turns.text: What are the id and names of the countries which have more than 3 car makers or produce the 'fiat' model ?

turns.query: SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country GROUP BY T1.countryId HAVING count(*)  >  3 UNION SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T3 ON T2.Id  =  T3.Maker WHERE T3.Model  =  'fiat';
